Name: infective endocarditis
Definition: An endocarditis that is characterized by inflammation of the endocardium caused by infectious agents.

Name: marantic endocarditis
Definition: An endocarditis that results from the deposition of small sterile vegetations on valve leaflets.

Name: obsolete Bacillus cereus pneumonia
Definition: An endocarditis that results from the deposition of small sterile vegetations on valve leaflets.
